review_text: Nice place and felt like home.
We stayed here with 3 small children and it worked great.

Bethany’s place was amazing! Extremely clean, and perfectly matched the described listing on airbnb. Host is also very communicative and responds timely. For the price you’re paying, it’s definitely worth the stay!

Recommended!!! We had a late night check in, and Bethany proactively communicated with us & made sure we have a smooth self check-in process. The place is very clean, well equipped & has everything we need for a one night stay.
Place was as described, neighborhood is quiet.
Super easy to find, gave us clear instructions with photo reference. Easy check-in, clean, and welcoming.

Such a cute place! I wish I was staying longer to enjoy it more. Honestly would live in the cute setup Bethany had! Perfect for what we needed and great for the price! Would recommend staying here and will stay again when back in Cedar.
This place is lovely. Clean, all kinds of extras, spacious. It is a remarkable bargain. We loved it.

Great stay for crashing after a long day. This is a room below a residence with children above so it can get a little noisy when quiet hours expire, it was peaceful during quiet hours. Bethany provided everything we could have needed which was very nice. Such as k-cups, shampoo/condition and body wash. Not a lot is required for checkout which helps get you moving on with your day. If you are traveling with someone that is more handicap the couch is not friendly to them but is great for a family as it can be used for an extra space for someone to crash!
Nice, clean little place to rest after a full day

Bethany’s place was amazing. It is really cozy, everything looks beautiful and well taken care of. It is located right next to the mountain so the view is just great. We enjoyed our stay and definitely would stay there again.
Great location and perfect for our family. We stay for 3 nights in Cedar City and enjoy the mountain biking and hiking in the area. There was also some great food in the evenings.

Clean place, good neighborhood, excellent communication, very accommodating, can’t say enough good things about the room. Had everything, including the kitchen sink. Would certainly stay here again when in the area.

Great place to stay, and Bethany let me check in early as well as accommodating other needs (cotton sheets).
Very easy to find and comfortable.
Only thing to be aware of is: bring ear plugs if you want to nap, because the adjoining room has noisy people sometimes.
I would stay again!
Great place to stay when in Cedar City. I will always look for Bethany's place first when staying in Cedar City.
It was a very cute place. It was quiet and felt super private even though the place is attached to the owners house. The price was super affordable! Would definitely come back!

We had a wonderful , restful stay. Our hosts were helpful, answered any questions very quickly. The kitchen was very convenient. We were able to cook a homecooked meal which was so appreciated after a week on the road!
Great spot on our way to Zion. Very clean and comfortable!

Bethany was a great host. She keeps an immaculate space that is separate from her home. Parking was very close and off the street. It is near the freeway yet far enough to be quiet and peaceful. Comfortable bed and set up to make your own meals if you want. Perfect spot to rest and relax.
Great cozy place to stay for a few nights
Bethany's place was just as she described. she was very friendly, helpful, and extremely quick to respond.

Wonderful, wonderful stay at Bethany's! It's even better and brighter than the photos. Love all the amenities— including the hot shower and fluffy towels (great after all the hiking at Bryce Canyon!). The beds was so comfy that I slept for 9.5 hours. :)
Great value, clean, hospitable, responsive and comfortable bed/ bedding. Good shower!
Very cozy and homelike. Definitely coming back with the family. Great host! Thank you Bethany!
We stayed one quick night passing thru town. Bethany is a very good host. The place was great! Very good price, too.
A very cute space with things to do not far from the house! Very responsive and helpful!
Bethany’s place was perfect for our needs this trip. She was kind and helpful and accommodating. Thank you!
Highly recommended! Clean. Easy to find. Private space. They are friendly too
Fluffy, fresh towels; clean and comfortable. Excellent value

Very clean, charming little space. The main room was a little different than expected, but with just 2 of us there it was perfect! Lots of nice little touches that we apprecoated. The family was very friendly and helpful when needed. Liked the easy checkin and checkout. Would definitely stay again.
Such a cute little place, loved that she provided instruction notes on the walls and had a roku for us to use. Would stay again!!
We stayed here for 6 nights. It was the perfect place to settle in and enjoy the nearby national parks. Bethany and Jed were very helpful and great to chat with. It was the perfect property for us.
I will definitely book again.
Amazing experience. the place had everything that I needed. everything was so clean.
Bethany was super responsive and her place was so nice, and very clean! Would stay here again.
We met Bethany after a wonderful first night. We’ve never seen such a great place!! Thanks for letting us stay😀

We really enjoyed our stay at Bethany's place. It is in a great location, great area in Cedar City. My daughter and I felt comfortable like we were at home. The instructions for everything was simple and easy, and Bethany was a great host. It was a neat place, very cozy and clean. The beds were comfortable and the bathrooms were well equipped. Our trip to Cedar City was great, and we were lucky to find such a great place to stay.
This stay is a gem. Host was responsive, place was clean and very comfortable. I would 100% stay here again.

This place had everything we needed. The hosts are very responsive and kind. The apartment like part of the house we stayed in was super adorable and clean. Also, it has a fantastic AC unit!! Highly recommend staying here!
Great place. Enjoyed my stay. Great communication from Bethany on the last minute later night reservation.

Very nice neighborhood with great restaurants nearby. The sunsets here were amazing. It was hot in July but the AC was nice and cool and the short drive to Cedar Breaks dropped temps to the 70’s. Relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Bethany was extremely helpful! We had a late booking, which she was amazing to message us back. We wished we could have stayed another night. When we went to book the next night it was booked sadly. We would definitely stay here again. Thank you, Bethany, for hosting!

We had a fantastic stay. There is a driveway that enables you to park directly in front of the unit. You have a private entrance and the unit feels very private. The space is clean and the bathroom is nice. There are two queen beds both of which have super comfortable mattresses. There is a refrigerator and many other amenities. The room was also very cool. We just stayed one night passing through but I wouldn't hesitate to book for a longer stay. Really, it doesn't get much better than this for the price. We were completely satisfied and highly recommend this option. Just book it!
I felt at home instantly. So cozy, comfortable and clean. The bed was so soft and amazing. I didn’t want to leave the next day.

Bethany's place was perfect for us! It was close to hiking and nature activities which we were going for. The fridge, microwave and hot plate worked great for our needs. The hosts were very responsive as well. Would definitely stay here again!
Great place!

this place was wonderful, off the beaten path, but not by much. very easy jumping point to downtown without being in the middle of it. great accommodations, quiet. Even had a little fireworks show a few blocks away, not too loud, great for the 4th of July (with no crowd)!
Great stay! Highly recommended Bethany and her property.
Bethanys place is perfect for a private stay. well worth the price. I would stay again.
Was a very cute place with near downtown and bike trails, along with all the amenities for a pleasant stay overnight!

My husband and I enjoyed our stay at Bethany's place. We have stayed here once before. The place is well kept and plenty of amenities. Bethany was accommodating given our request was last minute due to a family emergency. She was responsive and helpful. There are plenty of restaurants close by and close to 1-15 freeway. I highly recommend Bethany's place if you are visiting Cedar City.

It was more beautiful than the pictures! Bethany went above and beyond! Love the personal touch, leaving a personalized welcome note! It had everything we wanted. We only needed to stay one night, but we would comfortably stay longer! Worth the price!

We stayed for almost a week, enjoying Cedar City and the beautiful National Parks in the area. Rick was an excellent host - responsive and patient with all of my itinerary changes. The place was great, clean and comfortable - great location - and with an adequately stocked kitchen that allowed for us to cook all our meals. We loved staying here and hope to return.
Great spot to stay! Very cozy and tucked away. Host was responsive and helpful. Would definitely stay again!
Rick's place was perfect! Exactly as described, extremely comfortable. I would definitely stay again.
Good spot while staying in cedar city.. very close to everything.
Nice stay in a nice area with plenty of places around.
Great place! Super cozy!

Great place for a single or couple. Location was quiet, not far from the SUU campus. Great location if you’re coming for the Shakespeare festival; in the middle for Kolob, Zion and Bryce Canyon. The apartment was clean and well kept. Rick was responsive and friendly. This is our first choice for next visit! Thank you, Rick!
We had a great stay at Rick‘s place! Everything was clean and easily accessible. Rick answers very quickly and makes the effort of making sure everything is going well.
Very responsive and nice. Great place to stay for a vacation especially going to Zion. Easy drive and nice private area.
Very quiet and relaxing place. I recommend!
Very cozy and comfortable, great location close to campus.
Comfortable, and cozy. Has everything you need, and close to town.

I’ve stayed on both places before and have always had a great experience. This time was different. The stairs were very icy and it was dangerous getting to and from door. The heaters would not work and the place was terribly cold. Despite this Rick was responsive and returned the money.

Ricks place was perfect for me, walking distance to SUU, downtown and grocery store. He was very responsive to any questions I had and the place was perfect for me. Clean, well laid out and even had washer and dryer.
Apartment met our needs quite well. Neighborhood is quiet but older and not too appealing visually. Apartment is quiet-- except when the garage door below operates. Outside stairway is rather steep.
The place was comfortable and clean. Easy check in and check out.
We enjoyed our stay! It was nice being close to town.
was a nice place to stay
Great place, everything as expected, great location. Would recommend
Rick has created a comfortable, cozy place to stay. It was fantastic having access to a washer and dryer! I really enjoyed my stay...highly recommend this stay!
Nice and quiet neighborhood, no problems, Rick was very responsive. Overall great stay.
We really felt at home. We visited Zion NP and Bryce Canyon NP, so location between both parks was good. We would stay there again!
Really great, convenient and comfortable stay, Thanks Rick!
Quiet, clean, great location!
Good , quiet spot, relaxed and got work done.
Great value for my money. We spent Labor Day weekend and Zion and ricks place is in a great location to get there. Everything inside was as described and clean. Would recommend staying here
Great rental and great price. Way better than a hotel room.

Had a wonderful week visiting Cedar City. Saw 7 plays at the Shakespeare Festival. Although we would have liked to walk to the venue, 3 blocks was 3 LONG blocks. We have aged since we began coming to the Festival 20 years ago. 😊
Nice to have a kitchen to cook.
Nice, quiet apartment in a great location. Easy walk to the Shakespeare Festival.
Everything was perfect!

My wife and I were at the final stay on a long road trip and had an evening booked for a play at the Shakespeare festival in Cedar City and found Rick’s place the perfect spot to stay. Clean and quiet and close to the theater. Check in involved a key pad with a code that was a little difficult to enter which might be partially attributed to my 75 years advanced age but patience paid off and we found ourselves in a very comfortable environment for a few days. We are both retired actors and were impressed with the show we saw at the festival and a day exploring the Cedar Breaks National Monument provided good hikes and spectacular views. The bed and the air conditioning system were much appreciated during our stay!
Everything went smooth. Very clean and nicely furnished. Rick was responsive and helpful. Great location.

Rick’s place is a cozy, quiet, comfortable place for two. It’s walkable to the Shakespeare Festival and anything you need in Cedar City is less than five minutes away by car. The off the street private parking is a real plus. Rick’s communication is excellent. Great host!

This is our second time staying here, last time was probably 4 years ago. Great location to Historic Cedar City and approx. 15 minute walk to Shakespeare festival, which we did two evenings. There are very steep wood stairs to apartment and light was not working so we used phone light and did notify Rick. It was fine but would have been dangerous had we arrived in dark and hauling suitcase up the stairs. Rick responded quickly and I am sure having checked. There are two air conditioners in unit which kept the place very comfortable. The bed has a very soft pillow top, I personally prefer a more firm mattress. Also a very great location to driving to Cedar Breaks and hiking.
We always enjoy staying at Rick's place when we attend the Utah Shakespeare Festival. Everything is within walking distance. We also found some new excellent restaurants.

Had a great stay at this cute little place in Cedar City. Well-appointed, cute decor, and fabulous location (I was there for a funeral which ended upping just 5 min. away, and it was also within walking distance of all the Shakespeare Festival happenings.) Bed was comfy and everything was very clean. The only problem was that the first night there was a very noisy dog barking in the backyard of front house (on the premises) until 2 am. I messaged Rick and he was great, he spoke with the property manager and I did not hear the dog again. My second night's sleep was much better. I appreciated his prompt attention and realize this was something out of his control.
I would stay here again.
A lovely stay right in the center of town.

This was a great place to stay. We were visiting our daughters in town, and we even got to see one of them perform in her first USF play! Staying here made that experience even better. The accommodations were clean and comfortable–– more so than any other motel I've stayed in in Cedar City. The price was reasonable, the neighborhood quiet, well kept, and in a great location. We will be staying in this place again the next time we visit Cedar.
Nice rental in a good location to visit the NP Zion and Bryce.
Peaceful place to stay.

Great apartment with comfortable bed, well stocked kitchen, and peaceful surroundings. Rick was quick to respond to our questions. Great location if visiting the surrounding national or state parks. Would definitely stay here again if in the area.
Amazing stay close to Zion! Would totally recommend! Affordable and clean. Thank you!
Rick's place is so cute and cozy! My husband and I had a wonderful stay and would definitely stay here again.

it was fantastic. great room with kitchen, bathroom and some space to relax.
Walmart is just around the corner 5 min drive.
Zion national park is a 1:15 hour drive.
It is a beautiful and quiet place, suitable for couples. I like it a lot.
Clean, centrally located.
Great stay in Cedar City! Great wifi, bed, privacy, shower. Plenty of kitchen utensils for the stay. Would recommend! :)
Enjoyed the space. It was well equipped with kitchen items. It was quiet and comfortable. Good location, between Zion and Bryce canyons.
Great place for calling home while vacationing
Nice upstairs unit. Clean throughout. Bed is soft. Rick was responsive to any of our messages. Great private space.
It had everything we needed and Rick was very responsive! Great location and matched the description well. It was the perfect place to stay!
Nice place in a great spot. The only thing that was not up to par was that the bathroom sink was dirty and had not been cleaned. Great location.

Great location and wonderful place to stay! We were spending time in Cedar City to visit the national parks and this was a great midway point. The place was perfect and easy to get in. Rick was super responsive as well with instructions and any questions we had. Overall great stay!
Worked out perfect for my employee. Very comfortable. Will stay again when back in the area.
Rick's place was clean and exactly as described. The perfect place to come and relax while having day trips to Bryce and Zion.
Cute little space close to downtown, stores and restaurants.
Fantastic host and location! Would highly recommend!

Great location and nice place to stay, Rick is very communicative!
Highly recommended!
Great place

The place is as described and the host was very responsive. Rick made sure we checked in without issues and responded fairly quickly when we encountered a couple of issues with the heater and wifi when we first arrived. The place was very peaceful and had the amenities listed in the description. We had a wonderful couple of days exploring Cedar City and its beautiful surroundings!
Was just as described, has everything one could possibly need.
The place was perfect for 2-3 people and accommodated well.
Great host! Very responsive.

Rick’s places was very comfortable with all of the amenities to feel at home. The unit is fully equipped with kitchenware to be able to prepare a home cooked meal and take care of other things like laundry. It’s also very central, walking distance to grocery stores, restaurants and the Shakespeare Festival.
Rick was also very kind to let me check in early as I was coming into town early.
We stayed for about a month and Rick was happy to communicate along the way to help enhance our stay. Highly recommend.
Spacious well organized apartment with a spacious kitchen, washer/dryer, high speed internet, smart TV, off-street parking. All this is only a 3 block walk to the university.
Great spot in a wonderful location close to the Shakespeare Festival. The listing was just as described and had all the basics you might need.
Had everything we needed and so close to the Shakespeare Festival theaters!
Great spot, close to everything, very clean and comfortable!

Rick's place is awesome. Location is fantastic. We walked to Southern Utah University for the Shakespeare Festival plays. It's near Historic Main Street, with fun shops and eateries. The apartment is decorated so nicely. The kitchen is fully stocked. We used the blender to make smoothies in the mornings. The bed is so comfy.The neighborhood is very quiet. We very easily could have slept in but with all the beautiful mountains and National Parks near Cedar City we were up and going every day. Rick was great at communicating. His place was easy to find and parking is right next to the unit. If you are planning on visiting Cedar City, Utah and surrounding areas check out Rick's place out. We plan on visiting again in the Fall.
Lovely appartment, quiet, clean and 5 minutes away from everything.

This was a great spot to stay to see the plays at the Utah Shakespeare Festival. The walk down the street to the theaters was relatively short and a grocery was just around the corner. The guest house was clean and comfortable!
Rick’s was a great home base for a week at the Utah Shakespeare Festival! Nice neighborhood, comfortable accommodations… everything I needed was there! Hope to stay again next summer!
The place was clean and walking distance to the Shakespeare Festival.
Great location and very cute place. Cedar City is a great location between Zion & Bryce Canyon. It was a nice stay.
Nice apartment, good location for different national parks including Zion and Bryce, great communication with host!

We had a wonderful stay. The most important thing for me is that a place is clean. This place was very clean and had everything we needed for a great stay in the area. My husband especially loved the recliner after a day on the trails!
We spent a few days exploring the National Parks. Ricks place was exactly what we needed for that and at a great price too. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Great location with multiple hiking trails nearby!

This was an amazing place to stay! I loved cedar city, everything was very close and convenient. The place was very clean and easy to access. The only complaint I had was the dog at the front of the house starts barking at 6:45am every morning and doesn’t stop but, I don’t think that is his fault.
Very nice space in a good area with great amenities. Would recommend it!

Rick's place is great!! Easy check in, nice apartment with everything we needed and very clean. Very easy to get to Zion and the location in town is great, with everything you may need in a short walk or drive. I would definitely stay here again!

This is an amazing find in Cedar City, especially if you’re going to visit your student at SUU. Location and accommodations are fabulous. Stayed there for our son’s graduation this year. Wish we’d found this property sooner. Stay here, you’ll be glad you did.
Easy check-in, thoughtfully laid out, well equipped, it’s a wonderful apartment with a private entrance. A great place if you’re staying in the area.
Easy to locate. Very clean and Rick was very fast at communicating with us. Would stay here again.
A fantastic deal for a spacious apartment in a great location!

Rick's place was amazing. It is in a quiet neighborhood and you get your own private parking spot right next to the door. You are in the middle of town too so there are plenty of places to eat at that are within walking distance.

The space is very nice and actually bigger than I anticipated based on the photos. All of the amenities I expected were there with plenty of room to cook, relax, and enjoy an evening after being out hiking. Rick was very quick with his responses and made the check-in process smooth and seamless. The only thing, in my opinion, that could be improved was the bed, which I think just needs a thicker topper.

Rick’s place was impeccably clean and beautiful inside! The kitchen counters and the shower were fabulous. Stayed here for 3 nights when hiking in Zion and Bryce. East check in/out procedures and Rick was available via text and responds quickly. The kitchen was well furnished with dishes, cookware, spices and coffee! The only minor thing was that the mattress was not very comfortable at all and the sofa was very dated. But that didn’t stop us from thinking this was a great place to stay!

Location was a 10 min walk to town, where there are great local shops and restaurants to eat. Also around an hour drive to Zion which was a big plus. Accommodation had everything that I needed. The beds were comfortable. I would definitely stay here again in the future.

The location was convenient to downtown Cedar City for groceries, the post office, and all that one needs for a lengthy stay. The place was large enough for two people, and the separate bedroom/layout was nice. The kitchen suited our needs well. The neighborhood was pleasant.

Things may or may not be broken when you arrive. Rick is responsive in getting someone over to start/continue repairs. I kind of gave up after finding random corners cracked, fire alarms missing from kitchen, A/C filter that have never been cleaned, etc. It is a space to put your stuff in, sleep and shower. If you have asthma or allergies. Bring your inhaler and some pray. And clean before you do anything else!
The dogs at the front house start barking at 7:30 AM and do not stop until about 10:30 PM. Rain sleet or snow their owners just keep them outside. Saw 1 of the women try to beat the pitbull with a belt. If you can’t train your dog to be inside in sub-20 degree weather then don’t get a dog! The other neighbors seem somewhat normal.
Great location. Clean unit.
Sweet, safe town. Clean, private, lovely place. Bed is very comfortable. Easy to find. Rick was very responsive. Hour drive to Zion.
Was a great stay. Just note that it is down the driveway at the end.
Awesome spot close to the college, spacious, clean and quiet. Great value!

I was looking for a quiet place for a short stay-cation. Rick's place was the perfect choice. The apartment is clean, comfortable and tasteful yet simple in decor. Very quiet, good view of the Cedar mountains, nice bed and well stocked with all the essentials. The convenience of the location and parking (at the entrance stairs) are a big plus. Rick was super quick to respond. Definitely at the top of my list for future getaways.
It was a lovely stay and just what we needed. Easy access to nearby national parks. Near shops, restaurants and stores. Highly recommend Rick’s place.

The house is wonderful and the host is very responsive! All of the checkout requirements/expectations aren't clearly listed. This has been a bit confusing since he expects more from his guests than other hosts I've stayed with. He's great to talk to though, so just keep open communication and it's the best!
Great spot.

This is a great space - private, clean, and well-equipped. Good, centralized location just about an hour from Zion NP. Rick is communicative and quick to respond as questions arise. Recommended if you are looking to stay in the area.

Rick’s place is located in a wonderful spot for those wishing to explore major area sites such as Bryce Canyon, Zion, and Cedar Breaks. It’s also just a minute or two from local shopping, dining, and other services. One could even walk to many. The apartment is spacious, comfortable, and is well-equipped for anyone wanting to cook their own meals, pack light—given the benefit of laundry machines—or research things to do in the area by way of provided literature. Most importantly for me, as someone traveling alone, I felt safe there, as well as coming and going at all hours.
Thanks to Rick for his kindness, communication, and care.
Good location. Perfect for a couple
We had a wonderful stay.
This location is convenient to groceries, restaurants, gas and the Interstate. Quiet neighborhood.
This is a lovely place to stay. It has good parking and an attentive host.
Such a cute place, very clean, easy to check in and exactly what we needed.
This is the perfect spot in Cedar City. Incredibly comfortable, close to many good spots for day trips, and equipped with anything you would need for a short or long stay. Highly recommend.

Perfect for a busy weekend, if you have a whole weekend planned and don’t plan on being inside to much Ricks air bnb is perfect! Small and perfect for a couple or single traveler. Place is exactly as pictured, so no hidden surprises.

The perfect place for a couple on a quick weekend getaway! My husband and I were just in town for a couple days to see some friends at the Shakespeare Festival, and we managed a day at Zion as well. Very clean and nicely updated space with a well appointed kitchen, living area, and separate bedroom. Super close to the festival/downtown area. We weren’t there long enough to use the laundry, but always nice to have that in a space! Only very minor complaint is that the bed is situated between two doorways such that there isn’t space for a night stand on either side. Like I said, very minor, but I’m rather attached to having my phone, charger, and some water by my bed. Overall a beautiful, perfectly sized, and very well located place!
Comfortable, clean upstairs garage apartment in a good location, within walking distance to the Shakespeare Festival.
We really enjoyed our stay. The apartment was clean and comfortable and in a perfect location for our visit to the Festival. Rick was responsive to our needs. We will definitely stay here again.

We loved the place. The kitchen was well stocked with dishes, flatware, condiments, filled ice trays in refrigerator. Loved the layout particularly the bathroom with entrance from both the living area and the bedroom. We even had soap and shampoo provided in the bathroom.
if and when we called Rick he responded right away.
We were in Cedar City for the Shakespeare Festival and hope to return in future summers as the Festival was a great experience and are planning on continuing to use Rick's place. It was very much as advertised.
Loved walking to Shakespeare from the place. Great place and location!
This place is even more beautiful than the pictures!
This might work for you. Proximity to Shakespeare Festival is ideal. Basically clean, but no frills, some things need updating attention. Look around to compare. There are other places to stay.
Great unit. Private, quiet, clean and comfortable.
Awesome cute Airbnb and Rick was a excellent host.
Clean and upscale place on the second floor behind a home. Easy check in and very comfortable. It was a little over an hour to Bryce and Zion and a good central location.
Enjoyed the stay!

The location is excellent. We went to Zion, Bryce Canyon, and Red Canyon, and it worked great for all. Rick is helpful and communicative. The bedroom air conditioner broke while we were there, and even though we couldn’t get it working, Rick was very responsive and helpful in dealing with the issue (and thanks to a great ceiling fan, we were still comfortable). Everything else about the place was great!

Excellent location; near food and national parks (Zion, Bryce). OHas all the amenities, shaded parking, and very family-friendly with an open livingroom and full kitchen. We loved our stay and would choose here again!

This place was pretty perfect. The location was great with dining, groceries, fuel, and outdoor amusements all close by. We got to play on some nearby mountain bike trails which were tons of fun and less than 5 minutes from the door. The place itself is way bigger than we were expecting. It isn't huge enough for more people but two people could hunt for one another for a minute with the walkthrough bathroom. Really no complaints.

Good location in pretty dense downtown neighborhood. We appreciated the off-street parking.
One morning we were awakened at 6 am by a neighbor’s very loud TV?radio? This was not our best day.
Bed is okay not great.
Sofa bed worked well for our son once we found the sheets
Great place to stay! Very close to everything in Cedar City and even beyond. No issues whatsoever and would stay here again if I was in the area again!

We had a wonderful stay at Rick’s place. His apartment was nicely decorated, with tasteful furnishings and nice appliances. It’s located in a nice, quiet neighborhood...close to downtown Cedar City. Zion National Park and Bryce Canyon National Park are an easy drive from this location. We highly recommend staying here on your next visit out West.
Perfect little place, super clean and in a perfect location. The host was amazing. Thanks!
We had a good stay at Ricks place. Space was clean and big enough for what we wanted.Check in was easy. Overall it was a good stay.
Accurately described, clean, good location, smooth transaction from start to finish! Highly recommend. A+++

By far one of my favorite air bnbs the past couple of years. We appreciated the small touches in this apartment and appreciated the cleanliness and hospitality The location was close to family in Enoch, and close to main street and downtown where we enjoyed eating some Thai food and walked down to a small wine tasting room. We drove to Zion which only took about 45 mins. and also drove to Cedar Breaks National Monument which was about 30 mins. away. The location was perfect! We also enjoyed the Keurig for quick coffee before our drives to Zion that week. We will definitely stay here again!
Nice, clean place close to SUU!
Second floor unit, has nice view of nearby mountains to the east, very clean, and location is close to the main road. Has two ACs for each room, really helped since it was super cold at night
Rick's place is exactly as pictured. Easy to access and very quiet.
A great place to stay when visiting the Cedar City area.

Rick's place was perfect for a long weekend! It's in a great location near shops and the freeway. Rick's instructions and communication were very clear and easy. The space itself was also wonderful; comfortable, clean, and had everything we needed. Very happy with our stay!

This place is super convenient to SUU and downtown Cedar City. It does have stairs but that wasn't a problem for me. It was very clean and had everything I needed. It was perfect for just one person as I was there just to see an orchestra concert that my son was in.
about a 40 minute drive to Zion. not super close, but definitely a very comfortable stay at a great value. close to a lot of good restaurants. Rick was very accommodating

Good stay especially for the price!!
There was no dish washer. Place could’ve used new dish soap and sponge. Minor hiccups with heating and wifi (was super slow one day), but host was very communicative and resolved the issue immediately. The TV was super small so did not use. The place seems clean but on further inspection could be cleaner.
Place was more than enough for two. Kitchen had all dishes and utensils that we needed along with spices for cooking.

For stays over 30 days, host requests you to bring your own linens or will charge a weekly cleaning fee of $40. If near 30 days, host requests you wash the linens weekly. I was happy to do so, but guests might want to know since it's not in the listing.
Wifi wasn’t great for video calls, but okay for streaming and everything else. Overall the place was recently renovated with a convenient washer and dryer. Kitchen has plenty of dishes, seasonings, and things to cook with, however, the soap was watered down so I bought my own. Great location.

Would highly recommend this for any stay in cedar city! Great location and close to any shop or restaurant in town. The space itself was very clean and felt like a home. Any trips I take up to Cedar City I will definitely be staying here!
Clean cozy space
Such a wonderful place!
First time booking an airbnb in cedar city and couldnt have picked a better spot. Woke up to snow which is always fun for a california kid. Thanks for the hospitality Rick!
Completely private and nice place. Good location near everything.
