Great house with a lot of amenities - animals on location were a plus! All around very pleased with the stay
My daughter and I stayed here for one night. We wish we had time for a longer stay. Great downtown and restaurants are only about 15 min. away. Such a fun experience with the animlas

This place was a dream! I've never stayed anywhere like it. Loved the space, the ambiance, the little notes, the cleanliness. I came with my two teenage boys and it was one of their favorite things about vacation too! Thank you!
Great place to stay! Wonderful experiences
Our family loved the stay at Brandon’s place. We have never been somewhere so unique! I will recommend it to anyone traveling in the area! Our kids are already asking to go back!
Beautiful location, awesome rooms, great animals and helpful suggestions for enjoying Zion!

We loved our stay at the farm!! Our only complaint was that we wish we could’ve stayed longer. The sourdough bread was the best we ever had and we loved meeting hazel. Thanks Brandon for a great stay!
We certainly enjoyed the trip the animals added a real fun atmosphere.

We were welcomed with fresh sourdough bread and butter. That’s the way to my heart. The home was stocked with everything we needed. The animals were so much fun. My kids enjoyed the trampoline. The owners were so kind and helpful. We can’t wait to come back!
We enjoyed our time! Brandon and family were great hosts, the cows were fun, and ot was a perfect location for our hiking itinerary.

This is an awesome spot to stay! The cows were very active and the hot tub was amazing. We got hit with snow while there but it made the hot tub feel even better!
We’ll be staying here again!
We really enjoyed ourselves here. It was a good home base for a lot of hiking in surrounding area and unique. Brandon was quick to help. The views can’t be beat and we loved having our own cows.

Brandon was a great host. Beautiful property, loved the cows and other animals. Such a memorable stay.
Thank you

Where do I start?! I loved everything about this place!!! The cows, hot tub and mountain views is what drew me in to renting this location and it was everything and more than I could have imagined!
We loved all the details; animal food, fresh baked bread and a whole farm of friendly animals to love on. I took full advantage on purchasing more animal food from their vending machines because I could not get enough of feeding them all!
This is the perfect location to book with friends, spouse and kiddos! I enjoyed spending two days here with the hubs celebrating my 40th birthday!

I have stayed in many Air bnb locations and most of them are great. This location however added an extra level experience. We loved the animals and the fun that surrounded us. It wasn’t just a stay, it was an experience.

Absolutely loved our stay. My main reason for staying was for my love for animals. It was totally worth it! Weather wasn't the best but we made the best of it! Beautiful views of the mountains and extremely peaceful. 10/10 recommend and I hope to be back in the future.

Absolutely stunning property in every way. From check-in to check out from the to the property to the tiny house everything is as described and better than expected. We were thrilled to see the cows as we pulled up a little bit later than expected the area is easy to find via Waze but Brandon provided a solid GPS location in case we had any troubles. The ranch is easy to find with cheerful lights lining the drive if you arrive after dark. Each residence is marked clearly so there was no confusion as to which one we belonged to, and everything is well lit. We loved feeding the animals and saying hello. The stars at night are amazing, and so stunning to see, especially from the hot tub. It is rustic and beautiful and everything that we hoped it would be and provided a great starting point for our north Zion hike. Cedar city is a nice little town 10 min away with nice restaurants, grocery stores and outdoor stores if you forgot anything for your hiking activities (shoutout C-A-L Ranch).
Great stay, looking forward to coming again!

This Airbnb stay blew my expectations out of the water! The tiny home was very nice, beautifully decorated, Brandon and his wife left so many sweet personal touches behind from the treats for the adorable cows that you can feed on the patio, a handwritten note, fresh local sourdough bread and butter, and a cute scrapbook with a Polaroid for guests to add to. The location was stunning! Pictures don’t do it justice. The mountain surroundings are breathtaking, and my husband and I really enjoyed the serenity, peace, and privacy we experienced here. The highlight of our stay was getting to feed all the animals on the ranch and watching the sunset in our hot tub. We had the pleasure of being greeted by the hosts who were so kind and helpful and did a great job communicating proactively with us and giving us local recommendations. Could not recommend this place more. My only regret was not staying longer. We will be back! Thank you so much for everything!

Great stay! My kids loved it. They got to feed the cows first thing in the morning with the sunrise. It’s at a beautiful location as well near Zion. Also less than a 10 min drive to Cedar City, UT. Would highly recommend it.
10/10 experience! From the scenery to the peacefulness. The animals on the farm was the are the best type of company to be around. Would definitely stay here again!

Such an awesome experience! Loved all the animals! Enjoyed being able to explore the northern part of Zion- the part people don’t usually go to. Also got to hike Kannara Falls - off season so it wasn’t crowed. The hot tub was awesome after daily hikes! Easily one of my favorite AirBnbs!
We had a great time! So peaceful and a great escape, plus all the cute animals the we got to feed and pet. We will most likely be staying here again!

Brandon’s tiny home was all around amazing! We loved the house, the view, the homemade bread, the farm and most importantly Hazel & Bell. It was our first adventure out west and Brandon and his family made it very memorable!

We loved staying on the farm! The tiny house was spotless and the bed was very comfortable. The homemade sourdough was to die for! We loved the cows, goats, sheep, and even got to see the barn cat. 10/10 would stay again!
We loved this place! We loved the animals and it was so close to all of our activities. So many small touches that made the place really special. Would definitely recommend!
This was an amazing stay, beyond even what the pictures convey. So quiet, the cows were amazing and the place was so cute. Will definitely be coming back!

We loved staying here! So welcoming to have a fresh loaf of homemade bread and butter to enjoy on our arrival and in the morning with coffee. Enjoyed our Highland cows and so fun to give them treats although one seemed to like this much more than the other. Enjoyed the hot tub and the beautiful shower. Thanks so much!

Highly recommend this place! It was a very unique experience. We loved the sunrise views over the mountains, stargazing from the hot tub and of course the cute cows! The cabin is also very private and new and had everything we needed. My boyfriend and i stayed here while visiting Zion and it was all around an amazing time.

We had high expectations and they were honestly far exceeded! We want to go back already! The animals were unbelievably Ute and super friendly. We miss them already! Brandon was extremely nice and we could tell he would be willing to help us with anything. We will most definitely be back at some point!

The Grand ranch was an amazing place to stay. I enjoyed every bit of it, it was so peaceful, with beautiful views. I loved all the animals they were adorable. Especially the goats jumping on my boyfriends back. I also was very surprised to see they have a built in ground trampoline, which was so much fun. Everything was clean and so cozy. The hot tub felt amazing on my sore bones from snowboarding. Drinking my coffee every morning with the cows is something i can get used too! And the home made bread was so delicious, we had it with two of our dinners, it was definitely a trip for the books, I would 100% recommend staying here. Wonderful ranch With wonderful people and wildlife. Will be coming back soon!!

If you are looking for an amazing, serene, beautiful, private ABNB, pick this. I can't say enough great things. Worth every penny. How can you not love sitting in a spa and feeding the highland cattle.

Brandon’s tiny farm home absolutely exceeded all expectations! From the moment we checked in the host went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed. We were greeted with a hand-written note thanking us for the stay in addition to homemade bread- amenities you don’t typically find at other airbnbs. The rooms were as described and everything was clean & tidy.
The farm was also incredible! My wife and I brought our toddler along who absolutely loved all the animals and had the time of her life petting them. We 10/10 recommend this place for anyone looking for a unique vacation getaway near the mountains.
Very helpful and lovely little touches

I wanted to surprise my girlfriend with a unique stay and saw this place. I can confidently say that the Grand Ranch exceeded absolutely all of our expectations! The property was beautiful and everything about it was breathtaking. Brandon, the host, was really helpful and very nice he answered all of our questions really fast. The space was very clean and the mattress was actually so comfortable that we couldn’t get out of bed and ended up being late to our snowboarding trip! Being able to see the animals and feed them right off the porch was such a beautiful experience. Overall this has been one of our favorite trips and we will definitely be planning to return in the future! Thank you for such an amazing experience Brandon!

First of all - I thought the bed was comfy and the bathroom was spotless! This place deserves 5 stars overall.
This Airbnb is an entire experience. You wake up and your view is a beautiful sunrise paired with mountains and cows waiting for you to pet them. Their entire farm is filled with sweet mini animals and that in itself is incredible.
The family who lives on the property is very attentive. We got our car stuck in the snow and the son came out immediately to help us. Brandon (the host) was also so friendly and answered all of my questions almost immediately. They also had fresh bread and butter for us upon arrival.
The home itself is incredibly thought out. For a tiny home, there’s a lot of storage space. Hooks in every corner, door, mirror, just where you need it to be. The design and layout was very efficient and same with the Hot tub placement. You’re relaxing in the hot tub and all of a sudden your nudged by a gentle cow lol
10/10! So worth it.

Such a cute little place! It was really fun to hut tub by the cows, walk around the ranch and see all the animals.
It was great place to stay for our short little trip.. . Except the mattress broke our backs. :/
We loved Brandon’s place! Great view, we loved everything about it! Will be visiting again! Highly recommend.

Brandon and his family were all wonderful hosts and their ranch was absolutely magical. It was exactly as described and even better in person. We had such a great time exploring the ranch, surrounding areas and enjoying all the animals that we’re planning our next trip back.
We loved our stay! It was peaceful and beautiful with great amenities!
Loved the place , Brandon was great at answering all my questions, I’d definitely recommend to any family
This was our second time staying here and just like the first time it was amazing! Very clean! We loved looking at the sunrise from our bed and the animals were so cute as well!!

Our time at this Southern Utah haven was nothing short of magical! From the delicious homemade loaf of bread and a thoughtful card, to the festive holiday decor, Brandon and Hollie made us feel truly special. The genuine love from the sweet highland cows on the porch was a highlight, adding an extra layer of warmth to the experience. The well-built space offered awe-inspiring views of the mountains through its expansive windows, creating a serene atmosphere that's hard to forget. The furry friends on the farm provided an extra dose of joy, making the stay uniquely memorable. Our one-night stay left us longing for more, and we can’t wait to return to this enchanting retreat.
Great place to stay with unique experiences ! Really enjoyed our stay !

What a great place! Loved having the animals around!
The tiny home was so clean, the beds were comfortable and there were so many homely touches that made it perfect. We hope to stay again! Great hosts!

Such a gem of an air bnb. If you are debating booking, I would highly recommend! The farm animals were so cute and the house itself was very nice. Perfect stopping point. Brandon was also super responsive and helpful! We had a really positive experience here, even just staying for one night.
This was one of the best places I’ve ever stayed at. Everything was perfect. Highly recommend!

Beautiful and peaceful are both understatements. We felt right at home as soon as we checked in. Personal touches were made to the unit, including treats to feed animals! We absolutely loved petting the animals and getting away for a night. Quaint, authentic, and cozy! We would definitely recommend this place to anyone wanting to experience the roots of southern Utah.
BEAUTIFUL, PEACEFUL, and great for animal lovers! We had an amazing time!
Loved our stay at the farm! The animals are so cute! That and the hot tub was nice! We will be back!
we will be returning!
Wow! This was by far the best Airbnb Experience I’ve ever had! The Home was beautiful and the animals were cute! If you’re thinking about coming here DO IT!!! you will not regret it

We had such a fabulous stay @ Brandon’s ranch. We stayed 2 nights and wish we would have stayed for 3.
The accommodations were clean, up to date and accurate to the pictures posted
We met Brandon on site and he was lovely- assured us he would do anything he could to help make our stay more pleasant!
The farm animals were the best part.. oh, and the view
if you’re thinking about it, DO IT NOW. book it. from waking up to the animals, to the sweet touch of homemade bread at arrival- everything about the ranch was grand indeed!
Words can’t describe how perfect this place is! So beautiful and peaceful! I would highly recommend staying here!

I won't be able to say enough great things about this trip, we had the absolute best time at Brandon and Hollie's farm. Every detail of this Airbnb is SO well thought out. The tiny home was so beautiful and cozy, it was decorated so sweetly for the holidays. I had been worried about my partner and me being too tall to be comfortable in a tiny home, this was totally not an issue. Not only does the house feel very spacious, Brandon had replied to me very promptly about the ceiling heights prior to our stay. Brandon and Hollie are the best hosts- so friendly and engaging. And the animals are just the icing on the cake. This trip was so, so special and we can’t wait to return.

This is probably our favorite AirBnb we have had. The only downside is we only had it for one night. Brandon was super helpful and accommodating. The house was in perfect shape and had everything we needed. The animals and scenery were awesome. We will definitely be coming back and bringing the kids.

this place is a little slice of heaven. Highly recommend! Only 10 minutes from Cedar City and easy to find. The tiny homes are very well built with a lot of custom features and all of the farm animals are precious. Treat yourself to the experience, it’s totally worth it!
book it now, you won't regret it!

We had such a special time celebrating our Thanksgiving at Brandon’s Airbnb. It made a great home base for our travels throughout southwestern Utah. After a long day of hiking, it was great to come home and soak in the hot tub next to the cows! We also loved hanging out with all the other animals - goats, sheep, kittens, Alpacas, pigs and the very social chicken, Heihei. Brandon was an excellent, super friendly host and goes above and beyond to give his guests a unique experience. The cherry on top was the yummy bread that he left us!
Me and my friend really enjoyed Brandon's Airbnb, lots of super cute animals and very friendly host!

By far the most amazing experience I ever done in my life. I didn’t want to leave. I will always stay here for future vacations. The animals were amazing, Hey Hey the chicken was by far my favorite and a phenomenal tour guide. Always greeted us in the morning, followed us around the farm and was just the sweetest. I recommend this place to everyone. Absolutely amazing!
An absolute must place to stay! Beautiful scenery, calm area, very intimate. The animals were lovely and we enjoyed the trampoline. Will definitely come back next time I am in Utah!
The cutest stay near Zion, we had a blast feeding the cows and enjoying the incredible views. Will 100% be coming back whenever we’re back in the area!

The cutest farm stay in a beautiful area! Brandon, his wife and all animals were super friendly! They go out of their way to make the stay perfect and one of a kind including having the yummiest fresh loaf of bread ready for you when you get there! A must stay for anyone looking for a little adventure!

This has got to be the best Air-BnB I've ever stayed at. From start to finish the experience was amazing. Everything is well done and thought out. Easy access, great hot tub, cows ready to hang out and be fed. Beautiful tiny home. They left us a welcome bread and it may be the best fresh baked sourdough I've ever had. SO much to say but it is incredible and we will definitely come back. Thanks Brandon, we really enjoyed our stay!

Brandon and Hollie were really nice and helpful. They made us feel right at home and as though we were truly welcomed into theirs. I would love to go back. The farm life and atmosphere was really nice. I really recommend coming over and spending some time in their beautiful ranch. I thank Brandon and Hollie for welcoming us in to their home the way they did.

We absolutely loved our stay here! The cows were a delight and the whole cow themed home was so cute. This was our last stop on our trip and by far our favorite part of our trip. 10/10, five stars, would recommend to anyone and everyone! We will definitely be back.
Great atmosphere

The Grand Ranch absolutely surpassed my expectations. Brandon was an excellent host. He was very responsive before and during our stay.
The home was clean and comfortable. I couldn’t believe the cows were really just there to greet you right out the door! It was so fun and wonderful
I can not recommend them enough!
Our stay was amazing! My husband and I stayed there two nights and absolutely loved it. It was easy to find. Brandon was super friendly and helpful.
Very cute little place to stay! Great spot if you plan on going to Zions and want a unique twist on an Airbnb

This was by far the best rental experience my husband and I have ever had! We arrived and we’re welcomed with fresh baked bread and butter along with a handwritten note to welcome us. The place was extremely clean inside and outside. We had everything provided that we needed… coffee, dishes, utensils, extra bedding, etc. There were two Cows right in our backyard, and it was super fun to walk over and see the goats, donkey, and sheep. It is the perfect place to stay if you’re looking to visit Zion or Bryce Canyon. The hosts were super friendly and attentive to our needs. Thank you for this awesome experience!

My husband and I only stayed here for one night but man was it magical! The land was decorated so nicely for fall, the room was so clean, and the cows were ADORABLE! Great views, great hosts, 5 stars all around. Definitely recommend and I hope I get to come back!
Our stay was amazing! Went with four of my girlfriends over to Zion and stayed here and the trip couldn't have been better and more wholesome!

I can’t recommended the grand ranch enough! My partner and I had such a pleasant stay at the grand ranch tiny home. Everything was perfect, from the fresh baked bread to welcome us to the sweet cows we got to hang out with in the hot tub. The space was clean and so homey. Our view was gorgeous and everything looked exactly as the pictures showed. Brandon is so kind and went out of his way to make sure everything was perfect! The property is beautiful. We especially loved spending time with the cows and goats!! Definitely will be staying here again in the future!

Our stay was fabulous! The host was informative and polite. The place is just like the pictures. It felt like our home just smaller. Our cow friends are adorable and I was happy to feed them their treats! I would love to stay again and do the Kanarra Falls hike. Thank you for everything don’t change a thing it’s beautiful as it is! And the beard was amazing and a thoughtful touch.

We absolutely loved our stay!
The hot tub was so relaxing and fun with the cows nearby. We spent time in the morning talking with Brandon and venturing to feed the animals and see the farm.
The air bnb itself was new, well furnished, comfortable and the fresh bread was a delightful added touch.
We can’t wait to visit again!
5 stars all around!!

We absolutely ADORED this spot! I will definitely be back one day!
Just as an fyi, we used this address coming from Zion and just turned on to old bumblebee rd which is for a business that's not there called 4 seasons auto sales lol but hey it worked so whatever
940 old us hwy
Wish we could have stayed longer!
The building was very creative and beautiful. The surrounding area and farm atmosphere felt restorative and calming. The hosts were very friendly and welcoming. Couldn’t have been happier!
Sweet spot! Excellent host.

So grateful for the hospitality at the Grand Ranch!! Brandon made my birthday weekend so special, I couldn’t imagine a more perfect and unique getaway. My partner and I were so sad to leave, it felt like a dream! Definitely the coolest air bnb experience we’ve ever had.
Incredible property I really can't say enough good things about this place.
A beautiful and unique getaway. We’ll definitely be back!

The Grand Ranch is an epic place to stay. My husband and I were looking for a one of a kind place to stay for 2 nights to just relax. The home itself was the perfect size for us, and the hot tub was a nice added touch after a day of hiking. The highland cows and other farm animals were an added treat and super friendly. every single detail of the home and property was just beautiful and well thought out. It is easy to see that Brandon and his family love this ranch and work hard to upkeep the property. The home is less than an hour to the main entrance at Zion and less than 15 minutes to the Kolob Canyons. So many outdoor activities to do, we hope to make it back one day!
Amazingly beautiful place! I enjoyed my stay and loving on the cute animals. I would definitely visit and stay here again.

The unit was incredibly clean and beautifully decorated. It is modern but with amazing details and rustic charm. The host welcomed us with a note and a super delicious loaf of sourdough bread. It was such a surprise to have treats provided to feed the sweet cows, who welcomed the interaction. The hot tub and outdoor lighting made it so cozy to spend time outside the unit enjoying the night air and privacy. During the day it was so nice to explore the grounds and visit the other animals, the goats, sheep, alpacas and some kittens following us along the way. The grounds are just as beautiful during the day as they are at night. It is a hidden gem that we would love to visit again!!!

In one word… Magical. This place is an absolute must to stay at. The hosts are the most kind, genuine, attentive, people I have ever had the pleasure to meet. Upon arrival we were greeted not only by cows, alpacas, and two tiny kittens but by freshly made bread and butter. The only complaint would be that they don’t have extra loaves of bread to be able to purchase because it was the absolute best bread and I wanted to take some home to my family. I’m so thankful to have been able to stay here, it was such a pleasure to be able to just sit under the stars with the animals right at your front door. My girls really enjoyed the stay as well, they had an in ground trampoline, with a petting zoo on the property. Bring quarters for the goat food but the treats they provide are good for them as well. They also had the largest pig I have ever seen. This is not just a place to sleep, it’s an experience, an adventure. We loved every bit of it and I cannot wait to return.

Our stay at this charming farmhouse surpassed all expectations! We booked spontaneously, and it turned into an unforgettable experience.
The animals were a delight, especially the adorable baby kittens. The hosts made us feel at home and even surprised us with fresh bread.
The hot tub was a bonus that made our stay exceptional.
Five stars and highly recommended!

It was the BEST and most memorable Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in!! Brandon was also so sweet and responsive, answered all of my questions. The unit was clean, cozy and we were even welcomed with a lovely loaf of bread!! The hot tub was so healing we could see so many stars at night and the sweet farm kittens played with us the entire stay!! The mini cows and alpacas were SUPER cute and friendly, and Brandon provides snacks to feed them!! Not to mention there’s also little baby goats and sheep you can pet.
Overall it was such a peaceful stay, with lovely animals and beautiful mountains. Perfect after a long day of hiking at Zion. If you’re in Utah you must visit here!!

This airbnb was phenomenal! It truly exceeded our expectations and was so much fun! It was so clean and such a beautiful place to stay, with an amazing view to wake up to! The animals were so adorable and I never thought I’d be in a hot tub feeding cows treats, it was such a great memory for all of us. Not to mention, the hosts were extremely kind and helped with any of our needs. They even made us fresh sourdough bread and had plenty of games for us to play as well. Will definitely be coming again for a longer stay! I can’t recommend this place enough!
Cutest place me and friends have ever stayed at! Definitely recommend!
I have stayed in so many Airbnb’s and am in hospitality myself. Brandon’s place and hospitality were rockstar status! The place is incredible and the pictures don’t do it justice. Must stay!

Enjoyable stay in Cedar visiting my daughter. Place was perfect location and roomy. Beds were comfy and kitchen was well stocked. Ivie was very responsive and accommodating.
Bonus was getting a great massage from Ivie. Highly recommend.
Ivie’s place was so charming and perfectly comfortable after a long day of exploring. We felt right at home. It was exactly what we were looking for. Highly recommend!
Super friendly, and helpful hosts! Spacious place, and a good location to explore Bryce and Zion. Clean, all the utilities available, and a quiet neighborhood. Thanks both! Highly recommend!!
We really enjoyed our stay, very comfy. Our family was able to relax. We scheduled with Ivey for a massage. It was amazing. Would stay again.

This is the perfect Airbnb! I felt very safe in the location being a solo- female traveler, and it was well kept and clean. You can even book a massage in the wellness center downstairs, which is such a fun addition! The location is also walkable to cute restaurants and coffee shops downtown. Overall, this was a perfect stay for a work trip to SUU.

The place was very beautifully decorated , felt so homie . And only an hour away from
Zion which was a plus for us !

Perfect location for visiting both Zion and Bryce Canyon National Parks! Ivie's place had dedicated parking, easy entry into the property, and we appreciated having a grocery store and restaurants close by (we highly recommend checking out Centro's Woodfired Pizza!). Beds were comfortable, water was quick to get hot in the shower, and it was so convenient to be able to do laundry before the second half of our trip. Ivie was a gracious host and we especially enjoyed using the infrared sauna after a long day of hiking!

We enjoyed our stay at Ivie Garden Inn. It had everything that we were needing for our stay. The bed was comfortable, I usually don't sleep well the first night of vacation and I didn't have any issues here which never happens. Having a washer and dryer available was definitely a plus. We used this location as a base for us to go to Zion (an hour away) and Bryce Canyon (an hour and a half away). The views were great. The location was close to restaurants and stores.
We loved everything about this place. So cute and cozy, very clean!! It has everything you need for a weeekend getaway. The host was amazing. We will definitely be coming back.
Ivie’s place is a perfectly secluded haven in a quiet neighborhood. She was super accommodating when I altered my guest list, and she provided everything you could need at a home away from home.
Ivie's place was just lovely! It is quiet, clean, and really cute. I would love to stay here again!

Ivie's guest apartment was an excellent deal for our one-night stay. Nice little parking spot for two vehicles, the beds are very comfortable, and everything was clean and cozy. A peaceful space to relax after a long drive.

The whole area is one fulfilled dream after another. And the house matches. It is spacious, covering 2nd and 3rd floor with plenty of cozy areas to unwind. The kitchen is superb, as If a foody would have put it together.
I absolutely loved staying here! So clean and cute! 10/10! Will for sure book again

I stayed here solo while in town for a cycling race. It was perfect for my needs. The view of the mountain from the kitchen windows was pretty. Ivie was kind and responsive. The cookies in the table were a nice treat, and I enjoyed use of the sauna to ease my aches. I would stay here again (maybe next year).

We loved Ivie’s place. We were greeted with a smile and very friendly welcome. The apartment is very up to date. Nice kitchen with everything you need and welcoming homemade cookies. The bed was very comfortable. We only needed one bed but the unit has 2 more beds in a loft. We would highly recommend this place. We could have enjoyed staying a week!
Great place to rest and relax.

Ivie was great!! We had to cancel our stay at the last minute due to a winter storm affecting travel. She was a pleasure to work with. We are planning a return trip and will definitely look to stay here in the future.

The apartment is very well equipped, we had everything we needed to cook our breakfast . Bed was comfortable, the place is very well maintained everything looks like new! instructions were very clear , we spend one night only I definitely recommend.
Peaceful. Flexible and great communication.

This was a great place to stay for our Zion/ Bryce Canyon trip. Even though it is about an hour drive to the national parks, the airbnb was well worth it. Very cute and spacious, nicely decorated, and a ton of towels/cooking supplies. The location was so close to many restaurants and had a great view of the mountains. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
This is a perfect stay right in the middle of Cedar City. Ivie is responsive host and the home is just like the pictures. We highly recommend!

We enjoyed our stay at Ivie's! It was spacious and comfortable, with lots of cooking utensils and supplies in the kitchen. The neighborhood is quiet but close to the main street and easy to navigate to and from. Ivie was very friendly and responsive, and we enjoyed our sauna session in her massage studio below!
It was a short stay, but we would have gladly stayed longer. Ivie was very friendly and responsive. Allowing us to use the sauna was particularly lovely of her.
This was my first time staying at a Airbnb and I loved it. So much better than a Hotel. Very private and peaceful. No more Hotels for me.

This Airbnb is a gem. Ivie was an amazing host and great communication. It had everything you could ask for and enough space for multiple people. It was very clean and organized. They are different from a lot of Airbnbs and provide an amazing service.
Overall well rounded airbnb for the little time we spent in Utah. No complaints, easy to find and welcoming.

Ivie’s place is probably the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. The place is super clean, and looks just like the pictures if not better. Ivie went above and beyond to make us feel at home and comfortable. She even has a sauna guest can use. Must let her know in advance as it is part of her business on the first level. Peaceful neighborhood surrounded by breathtaking sights. Perfect place for a great getaway!
Loved our stay! Ivie was so accommodating and responsive. Highly recommend!

I loved this place. So clean and quiet. I felt right at home.
Next time I am in town for work, I will stay here again if it is available.
Highly recommend!!!

Our brief stay here was incredibly comfortable! This stay exceeded our expectations. It was even better in person than the pictures. The temperature upon check-in was just right, a thoughtful detail particularly appreciated during the winter season. The beds were cozy, the bathroom spotless, and the kitchen was perfectly equipped with everything we needed to make a quick breakfast before heading out. The host kindly offered to allow us to return after check-out to freshen up with a hot shower following a full day of snowboarding. We're already planning our next trip to Brian Head and will undoubtedly choose to stay here again. Thank you!
We enjoyed this house. It was definitely worth the price and the house was clean and comfortable.
Staying here was great! The photos don’t do it enough justice bc they need more of them, but it was a great space! Very lovely and perfect for what we needed.
Great people, Great location, we will be back.
What a great stay!! This was the cleanest, most well put together place we have stayed!! The decor, the amenities, the cleanliness, oh and the hosts..amazing!! We will be coming back here for sure!!!
Worth the stay and could not complain about anything! Would definitely stay here again when in town!

I was in town for doctoral candidate interviews so spent most my time out of the house . However when I was there it felt like home away from home. Very clean and cute place! I was able to have a brief encounter with Ivie outside. She was very kind. Was bummed I didn’t have time for the sauna or booking a massage :) I will for sure want to stay here again! Walkable to downtown and suu when there isn’t a snow storm :)

basically…… you NEED to book Ivie’s Garden if you’re staying in Cedar. Period. Everything was seamless, we checked in later in the evening and she still left the door unlocked for us. I loved sleeping on the third floor. It’s so cozy and the window has a great mountain view. The house is equipped with everything you need. no need to ask for trash bags or paper towels! She has your stay completely considered. Yes it’s the back house, but we really did feel like we were apart of their home. She even offered us late check out due to a snow storm but i’m proud to say this cali girl made it to the highway on snow covered roads 💪🏾Cant wait to see Ivie’s Garden in the spring and maybe play on her trampoline!
Absolutely beautiful. Everything was just as listed and described. Host was flexible with my checkin. Would definitely stay again.
Great place and very clean!
Second time staying here. Owners are very kind and responsive!

It took me a while to write this review because life gets busy and I wanted to make sure I had the time to give a review of Ivie and her beautiful family. From the moment I saw this place it reminded me of home. When we arrived there was dedicated parking space and a cute lighted path to the entrance of the air bnb. We didn’t even feel like we were renting another persons home it felt like home and it was so peaceful and cozy. Prior to arriving Ivie was very communicative and responsive offering suggestions on activities to do as well as offering the sauna after our long hike of Kannara falls. My friend and I stayed there for my birthday weekend and Ivie and her husband were so friendly and turned on the fire pit for us the second night so we could roast marshmallows. There were plenty of towels a washer and dryer and the beds cozywere I cannot even put into words the kindness and comfortability we felt while staying here. Thank you again Ivie and we will be back when we visit utah!!
I recommend it 5☀️

Ivie's garden was a delightful place to stay. I love how light and airy the whole apartment is. It has a delightful balcony with a small table and a couple of chairs that one could enjoy breakfast outside. The garden surrounding was pleasant, and the ducks were fun. It is a half mile walk to the Shakespeare Festival on pleasant, tree-lined streets, and also within walking distance to the grocery store.
We were very comfortable, and everything seemed high quality. It was especially pleasant to have high quality appliances and dishes in the kitchen.
Ivie was very quick to responded to our questions and needs. We would definitely stay here again.

We would definitely want to stay here again! Located on a quiet street in walking distance to the Utah Shakespeare Festival and restaurants. Space has everything you need including washer and dryer. Loved the back deck for bird watching. Cool loft area used by our kids. Host gave us a great restaurant recommendation we used on our first night in town. Cozy, clean and homey space. You won’t be disappointed!
Ivie’s place was exactly as described. She was immediately responsive to our questions. We had a very positive experience.
Great place, perfect for what we needed. Peaceful surroundings, Ivie has fruit trees all around the property. We will visit again

We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves and thought the apartment was terrific. The beds were comfortable and we will definitely book Ivy Garden again next year when we visit Cedar City for the Utah Shakespeare Festival.
We were in town for a play—it was very close. It was conveniently situated. It was a great experience and I would definitely recommend this place to others.

I could go on and on about how great this place and its hosts are! The building is new construction - everything inside is new, and it's very nicely appointed and designed. The kitchen has: full sized fridge with ice and water, dishwasher, pots/pans, gas oven/stove, microwave, Keurig, spices. There is a washer and dryer in the bathroom. You can set the a/c in several different areas with individual remote controls (in the bedroom, loft and main living area). The bedding was very cozy. We enjoyed the balcony in the mornings and evenings. We didn't take them up on using the infared sauna, but my husband did schedule a massage with Ivie, who was very thorough and knowledgeable.
Ivie and her husband were very accommodating in several ways and we are very thankful for them. If you choose to stay here you will never regret that decision.
Ivie doesn't advertise this, but she makes the soap that is in the bathroom, and she does have some for sale. Buy some if you have the chance!

Beautifully decorated apartment with a bright, modern, relaxing feel. Comfortable bed and sofa, gorgeous kitchen area with everything you need to prep a meal. Lovely deck with nice chairs for reading and taking in the sunrise (overlooking the coolest ducks I’ve ever seen).
Walking distance to downtown!
HIGHLY recommend booking a massage with Ivie while you’re there!

It was a perfect location for our party. We spent a few days at Shakespeare festival (just down the road). The property is newer and very bright and clean. We enjoyed the back patio as often as we could. Full kitchen was most helpful. The hosts were very accommodating and kind. We have stayed at several locations in Cedar, this is our new favorite. We will be back.

We booked this place kinda last minute as we surprised family for the holiday but it was a true find.
Not only we’re her instructions clear the property was clean and looked liked the photos. We all know there’s nothing worse than booking something and then you get there and it’s not what was advertised but this was not the case.
The property is located so close to town and easy access to shopping and restaurants. The best place we ate at was THE PIZZA CART! Sooo yummy! A little bit of a wait but so
Worth it!
We really enjoyed how quiet the location was me how it was so easy with getting in and out of the property. Everything was tidy and we had only 1 issue with the Roku provided but that is no biggie we watched our computer.
Great stay!
We had a great stay! Would stay here again.
Great place! Clean and well furnished. Very comfortable. Great hosts!
Great place. Perfect for me and my kids. It had everything I needed.
This is a wonderful place to stay. The place is first class, in a quiet and friendly neighborhood, and close to restaurants, stores, the university and the great outdoors. I had a perfect stay.

Ivie’s place was absolutely a refreshing stay! Newly constructed and clean.
Enough space for you to stretch out and enjoy the comfort. Beds were very comfortable. And a beautiful kitchen.
Laundry facilities we’re a plus. Dan and Ivie were very friendly and helpful with our stay.

Loved this AirBnb. Ivie was a wonderful host. She was attentive and nice, and check-in process was very convenient. Best part of this place was that it is relatively new, and therefore very clean. Extremely spacious and comfy. There is a full kitchen with everything you need + nice bathroom with washer/dryer and comfy beds + large TV! Ivie also let us use the dry sauna she owns downstairs in her parlor after a long day of hiking at Bryce. Location wise, Cedar City is ~1hr from Springdale (Zion) and ~1.5hr to Bryce National Park. We thought it would be a bit closer, but we didn't mind the drive. However, if you are looking for a closer place to the national parks, Cedar City might be a bit farther than other areas. Cedar City has everything you need (Walmart, Starbucks, restaurants, etc.,) which was nice. The location is also very quiet and peaceful, with lots of stars in the night sky. The patio/balcony is also a nice touch. We loved our stay here and we highly recommend it!

Really enjoyed our stay here. Everything was exactly as presented. ALSO- and this is a big one for me- the kitchen was both clean and fully stocked with everything short of the actual food and she even had spices. Really appreciated that, because sometimes you come to stay at a place with a kitchen and you forget you need seasonings and you're eating saltless eggs for breakfast.
absolutely amazing! we can't wait to visit again!
Super cute place and convenient to everything you need.

Ivie and her family were very welcoming. Her husband met us as we arrived to check in to help explain a few things. The building is brand new. The interior was nicely decorated. New furniture!
Their AirBnB is above Ivie's massage studio, were she sees clients. Although it is listed as a separate house, it really has more of an apartment or guest house feel as the building is located in the back yard of their home. The backyard and garden surrounding the unit is a work in progress, and included a chicken coop. We heard neighborhood noises and nearby traffic noise at times.
Two coworkers shared the space and realized it was better suited for a related couple or small family to share as their was not a door for the loft bedroom area. We were also counting on the use of the clothes washer and drier during our stay, however they were still inoperative when we arrived. :(
Otherwise, it was very clean with a well stocked kitchen and all new appliances and furniture! Good base camp!!!

This was a great place to stay! The owner communicated well. It was clean and everything was new. The kitchen was stocked well. The beds and pillows were comfy with nice soft sheets. It was very nice for them to allow a free infra red sauna session at our stay.
The place was clean and well organized. Host was very friendly and helpful.
Great place to stay! East access to things in Cedar. Care and thought out into the place. Will definitely stay again. Owner communicated well!!!

We had a great time here! It’s peaceful and beautiful. We loved the cows, especially the babies! The place was very nice and comfortable, and the hot tub was great! We would love to come back sometime.
Great place to stay

Two adult couples in our family stayed at the Smart Blue House for 4 nights early in May. During this time we made daily excursions to the national parks in the area. We enjoyed the accommodations at the Smart Blue House and it served our purpose well. The home was very clean, secure, and conveniently located. Kitchen was well equipped and had everything we needed to cook meals. There are lots of places to shop and eat nearby in Cedar City and it was a good location from which to make trips to Zion, Kolob, Bryce, and Cedar Breaks. I do not hesitate to recommend this vacation rental and would stay there again if we are in the area. It was a good value and Nathan responded immediately whenever we messaged him. It is obvious that he takes pride in keeping the property in good condition and accommodating guests.
Nathan was quick to respond. The home has activities and a nice backyard. 5 min drive to downtown. Thank you.

House was quaint, it had some unfinished work in the basement that made it seem dingy. The temperature was 80 degrees in the house when we got there and there was no cooling system. The host did come by the next day and hook up the swamp cooler. Beds were very firm if you like that. The host was responsive to questions.
The house was really nice! It was clean, and comfortable. We loved the games in the basement. It was really nice to park in the garage.
Would have had more time to spend at home, but we could not due to the tight timelines of our trips. The home is simply great for families, excellent location and neighbourhood
A great location and a perfect house for a group of people!

Stayed here for a spring break trip to hike the national parks. Fit exactly what we were looking for. Was a little over an hour to get to both Bryce and Zion National Park’s entrances so it worked perfectly to hike both. Loved it!

This place was great! Nathan and Beatriz were great hosts - very proactive and responsive. The description and photos of the home are accurate. The games in the basement were a nice added bonus as well. Would stay here again!
Great place to stay!
Was very nice and clean. Would stay there again.
Nice cozy little place, in a quiet neighborhood, exactly what my wife and I were looking for.
Everything was as expected. Spacious home, great area/home for family get away!
Clean house, good location. Host is a great communicator.
Nathan is very helpful and responsive to any questions I had.
Great place
Great stay. Exactly what we needed during our time in Cedar City. Thank you.

Great house! Clutter free home that had everything necessary for a comfortable stay. Ping pong, board games, and a study nook all appreciated by the kids. We enjoyed the master suite in the basement away from the bustle. Clean bathrooms and linens, nicely accessible kitchen. Smart tvs to use our streaming services. Also really appreciated the garage to lock away our bikes while we were in Cedar. Thanks Nathan!

We loved Nathan's Blue House! Our young kids had a blast exploring the back yard and we had fun playing ping pong with our teenager in the basement. The location is great for exploring Cedar City, heading down to St. George for a day and/or exploring nearby National Parks. We look forward to staying at Nathan's again!

All was just as depicted/expected. Space was ideal for our family group of 7. We were just passing through and it worked great for us. The garage is big enough for 2 full size SUVs. The 2 TVs worked well. The extra table allowed us to all have dinner together. Nathan answered the one question I had quickly. Not everything is fancy, but it's nice, had everything we needed, and the price was right.
Great price, great place!
This home was very clean, well stocked and perfect location for us. Not only was Nathan super prompt but also super kind in willing to work with me to adjust head count and dates. thank you!
Nice place. We enjoyed our stay.
The little blue house was perfect for our family. Plenty of comfortable beds, well stocked kitchen, use of the garage was a plus.

Beautiful home! Host was quick to respond and communicate when need popped up. House is in a great, quiet neighborhood with lots of activities close by. Home is very spacious! Big backyard for kids or a nice evening outside relaxing. The ping pong table was a hit!

Perfect place for our group of 8! The home is easy to get to. The kitchen had so many helpful appliances if you didn’t want to eat out every night. Nathan and his co-host were very responsive and helpful. I’d definitely stay there’s again!

Nathan was extraordinary and SAVED US. We arrived in Cedar to stay at a different AirBNB, and the air conditioner was not functional. The host was unresponsive, and the heat was unbearable ( 94'F inside, which is crazy even if I wasn't pregnant!). We contacted Nathan at 8:00 PM in desperate need of a different place to stay, and not only was he sympathetic and sweet, but he was ready for us to come immediately to the house. It was wonderfully clean, AND he even ran over to the house before we arrived to open windows and turn the AC on full blast to cool the house down even more. It was so thoughtful and I feel truly indebted to him for his quick response and preparedness. The house was lovely and we had a great place to rest during our busy time in Cedar. Thank you!

We booked this place not knowing the area at all. Coming from Australia we planned to visit Zion and Bryce Canyon and use Cedar City as a base. Nathan and Beatriz’s place was a perfect place to do that. Clean, tidy, heaps of space so everyone could have a bedroom, well stocked, good cooling for the heat wave, even a table tennis table and a work space (we were on holiday so unused!). It was about an hour to Zion and about an hour and a half to Bryce Canyon. And the unexpected extras like Kolob Canyon (western part of Zion and only 20 minutes away) and the beautiful Cedar Breaks National Monument (like a small Bryce Canyon). We had a great stay and would definitely recommend this place.
Cute little spot!
Updated, clean, quiet neighborhood, 5 minutes from Shakespeare festival, perfect for a quick weekend stay
We had a great stay at Nathan’s place.. he responded quickly to all of our questions. We’ll definitely look him up next time we’re in cedar city
Super nice and clean place!! Lynn is a great host.

We absolutely loved this Cowboy Cabin. I was raised watching John Wayne and this place was awesome. I had a few questions right when we got there and Lynn was extremely quick to respond. And come to find out the directions were there all along and I just didn’t realize it. He was so nice about it. I didn’t need to bug him, but it was great to know he was only a message away.
Perfect location for what we were doing. Super clean. Loved the decor. I’m secretly hoping my wife wants to redo our home into a cowboy theme after staying there. Can’t wait to go back. You gotta check this place out, but not all of you. I want to be able to book it next time we pass through.

Saddle up and dive into the cowboy dream at this charming A-frame log cabin.
From the moment we arrived, we were enchanted by the rustic charm and cozy atmosphere of this authentic cowboy retreat. The cabin comfortably accommodated our group of 7 providing ample space to relax and unwind after days filled with adventure.
Speaking of adventure, the location couldn't be more perfect for exploring the wonders of the Wild West. Every day brought new thrills and excitement.
But what truly stole our hearts were the little touches that made us feel like true cowboys and cowgirls. From the friendly horses greeting us across the street to the mesmerizing stargazing opportunities at night, we were transported back to a simpler time, surrounded by the sights, sounds and smells of the frontier.
Our experience at the cowboy cabin was nothing short of magical. This charming retreat is the perfect place to hang your hat and immerse yourself in the beauty of the American West. Thanks for hosting!
My kids LOVED this place and the loft was perfect for them! Such a cute little cabin. Would stay here again.

Cowboy Cabin is great! Lots of open space in the house so our family felt like we could spread out.
We travel with our 5 kids so it’s important to be able to find a family friendly place. They had a stocked with toys play room where my kids could re-enact lightsaber battles or relax with stuffed animals and read a book.
I loved the overhead rain shower head in the main floor bathroom added with the on demand water heater and I had a rejuvenating shower.
There are fun details everywhere from the backsplash to the painted cows. You can tell the hosts are detail oriented from the layout to designs.
You’ll have a restful time and feel that the cabin rejuvenates you. 10/10 recommend.
The area is so fun with horses, sheep, and other farm noises and gives an authentic experience.
Have fun!
Maylin’s place was a great spot to stay in Cedar City. Maylin was communicative and it was very easy to check in. Would highly recommend!
GR8 Host & Place! Would definitely stay there again!!
We really enjoyed our stay here! Extremely clean! Maylin was very friendly and responsive. We also loved playing with Minnie and Bobo. Hopefully we’ll get a chance to stay at Maylin’s place again!
Great stay. Convenient and cost effective.
I had a great stay at Maylin’s place! It was very clean and very peaceful and very easy to check-in. Definitely recommend this air bnb!
This was a great place to stay at.

Great Airbnb, wonderful owners!
In the middle of cooking, we ran out of gas for the grill, and they immediately fixed it.We loved this place!
Absolutely stunning place. If the real prancing pony had been this nice the ringwraiths would have downed a cold one stead of trying to kill Frodo!

The place was as described. Conveniently located for my parks visits in a nice town with plenty to do and whatever I could use for my trip. Tara was quick to respond and accommodating for what I needed.
Great area, great little place, loved it!
Lovely stay! So clean and comfortable - a wonderful respite after a day of hiking. Thank you, Tyra and Chris!
Great, comfy place!!

This was the 3rd Airbnb that we’ve stayed at in Cedar City while visiting my daughter who attended SUU. Our first night, it was so cold outside and our room was nice and toasty inside. Everything we needed was available. Tara messaged us that if the place was ready early, she would let us know. Sure enough, it was! We were able to drop off our things before heading out for graduation festivities. We will definitely book again when we come back into town!
such a homey and clean place to stay

Our stay at The Prancing Pony was absolutely perfect! Tyra’s place went above and beyond in so many ways including the Lord of the Rings themed decor and especially the cleanliness (and we are very detail oriented people). It was so cozy- we felt like we were in our own home and it was the perfect place to curl up under a cozy blanket after long days of hiking in the National Parks! Thank you so much for opening your home to guests like us! We will not hesitate to come back or recommend this stay to others!
We loved staying here for the weekend. It was perfect for us. It was very quiet and relaxing. Definitely will be back when we visit Cedar City again! Thanks Tyra.
Loved our stay at Tyra’s, I would highly recommend staying at her place if you are visiting Zion.
We really enjoyed our stay! Quiet and safe area, cute space, and had everything we needed.
Your studio is beautiful and comfortable and we look forward to coming back to Cedar City to reserve your backyard Hobbit Suite.

This is my second time staying at Tyra’s listing. The first was the hobbit house. Both were absolutely amazing. Super comfortable and super clean. Tyra is such a kind host. I would definitely recommend this listing to anyone who likes peace and quiet. Also, we got dirty a lot in our hikes and activities so having a place to do laundry was so amazing!

The Prancing Pony is an adorable apartment equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay. It’s cozy and comfortable, perfect for our stay while visiting Zion (1hr drive to Visitor’s Center in Springdale). There are lits of food options nearby and supermarkets to get snacks for our hikes. Plus the LOTR touch was awesome!

great stay about an hour to zion! lots of restaurants and a cute coffee
shop in town. easy parking. access to laundry was amazing!
Enjoyed our stay!
Everything was great!!

Booked this for my daughter for her spring break and she loved it! It was easy to find with the detailed instructions provided. Tyra was friendly & responded quickly with any communication we had. The prancing pony was super cute and clean, just as the pictures portray it. Would definitely stay here again.
Tyra’s place was cozy and clean! It was perfect for a short weekend in Utah visiting Zion NP and Bryce Canyon NP. (:
Lovely place, comfortable, close to town, Tyra was a great host!

I spent two nights at the Prancing Pony airbnb in Cedar City. It was a great experience. The apartment is spacious, clean, comfortable, homey and attractive. Checking in was easy and straightforward. The wifi is strong. There’s a full kitchen, stocked with pots and pans, dishes and silverware, coffeemaker and toaster. Easy parking in a designated space. By the way, I stayed in Cedar City because I wanted to have a look at the petroglyphs/Indian rock art at nearby Parowan Gap. It was extraordinary and the Prancing Pony airbnb was the perfect place to stay.

What a Gem!! Perfect accommodations to fill all your needs. Very Clean, Well Equipped Tastefully decorated and close to all the downtown activities.
Tyra was so easy to work with and went out of her way to make sure my stay was comfortable. I would definitely recommend.
We would definitely stay at Tyra’s place again. She was very easy to work with, and it was very convenient for writing our Trikes and getting all over town.

Felt at home at Tyra's place and loved the decor. A super cozy bed. We could hear upstairs activity and they could hear us, but both parties were conscious of that. I appreciated the quiet hours. A great place to stay while in Cedar.
This place is awesome! Clean and comfortable. I love the theme and the decor. If you are a LOTR fan you will really appreciate it. I will happily book again.

What a beautiful little getaway. Tyra pony place is very thoughtful air Bnb. I work in hotels and it is put together like a very sweet little concept. It is so cozy, has more than everything you could ever want in the fridge and ready to serve. Beautiful bathroom and linens. It is very quiet, I slept so well.
Highly recommend. Tyra was so helpful and gracious
Thank you Tyra it was adorable!
It was all spectacular, the place is beautiful! I recommend it 100%
Very unique and memorable experience! My favorite place on airbnb so far. 10/10 plan on visiting their other property or this one again next time I go to southern Utah.

We had such a good time!! The place was extremely clean, and the room was the perfect temperature. The kitchen had everything we needed, which was a big deal cause we love making our own food, and it was quiet and peaceful. 11/10, we would absolutely stay again.
Tyra was very helpful and fast at responding! The place was very comfortable and clean.!

Comfortable basement apartment! Hobbit theme was fun! Everything was as described and clean. We enjoyed our stay! Tyra was very responsive and easy to work with. She made sure our stay was comfortable.
Very nice and clean. Our go to place in Cedar City.

Kyra’s has a great king bed — this was the soundest sleep on my three-week drive from Phoenix to Seattle and back via Zion. To cap this magical experience I woke to find six inches of powder snow had fallen overnight. This transformed my Zion photos.
There is a boxed set of Tolkien, and I enjoyed reading chapter 7, which confirmed that the oldest creature in Middle-Earth is Tom Bombadil. I’m approaching Tom’s age myself, and I really enjoyed the creature comforts.

Loved our stay here! Tyra’s place was cozy and fun with the LOTR theme. So many wonderful amenities in a small space. Was perfect for our ski trip to Brian Head. Close to the resort as well as great food options in Cedar City.

We had a lovely stay at Tyra’s airbnb! Everything was very clean and the bed was very comfy. The Tupperwares were great for our hikes to Zion! Would recommend this place without a doubt and Tyra was a great host!
Great place! Love the LOTR theme!

I went here with my girlfriend to visit Brianhead to go skiing (only 40 mins away!). As we are both Lord of the Rings fans, Tyra's airbnb stood out to us! We absolutely loved the LoTR theme! The unit was clean, had multiple amenities, local recommendations, and had awesome decor! We had a great time in Cedar City and at Tyra's airbnb. I definitely recommend it and if I am able, I would stay here again! Check it out for yourself!
Great place to stay! We will definitely use them next time we are in town.
Tyra is a fantastic host. Quick to respond to any communication and friendly. Her space was very clean and quality linens on bed and towels. I highly recommend staying here!
Clean, comfortable, easy place to stay at. All the things we needed, none of the fuss. The LOTR theme was fun and well done. The entire airbnb was very well done.
Very nice place. Quite and comfortable. This is our go to spot when visiting Cedar City.
Very nice stay with a wonderful host.

Oh my gosh, I can’t rave enough about this place. It was absolutely beautiful and every detail was carefully considered by the hosts! We were sad we only stayed for one night because it was so lovely, comfortable, and clean! If we ever come back to Cedar City, I will absolutely stay here or at Tyra’s Hobbit House if at all possible!!
The LOTR details were on point!! Perfect for a fan or any lover of whimsical spaces.

We enjoyed our stay at Tyra’s prancing pony. Very good use of space. We had everything we needed . Comfortable bed. Kitchen well equipped . Nice to have washer and dryer . We hope to come again . Private entrance was great
This studio is a great place to rest after a long day exploring! Peaceful location, next time we are in Cedar we would definitely stay here again

Loved this Lord of the Rings themed Hobbit Inn. We arrived after three days of outhouses, swimming/kayaking in the Colorado River, dirty hikes, and a below freezing campout at the Grand Canyon. It was HEAVEN to wash up in the full bathroom, do a load of laundry, check in w the high-speed internet, and cook up a storm in the full kitchen. Tyra recommended an AMAZING hike at Kanarra Falls Slot Canyon and told us how to get permits online. They were booked up, but we were able to get them in person. This was the best hike of our trip!!! The bedding was especially soft. The Hobbit Cottage yard was gorgeous. And our hosts were friendly and helpful! Thank you Tyra and Chris!!!
This is an outstanding choice to stay when you visit Cedar City. We wish that we could have stayed longer in Tyra’s, isn’t was do peaceful and comfortable. Hopefully we will be back.

Tyra's place was well appointed and very clean. Very private. Close to downtown cedar city. We really enjoyed our stay.
Also, I left an item behind, and she communicated with me immediately about that. I really appreciated that.
Clean with everything you need in a quiet private little basement t studio. Perfect place to rest after a day hiking in Zion.
Great stay, easy check in and the drive to Zion was beautiful.
Super clean and modern. Very good communication and easy to get into the place. Would stay here again.

Great Aibnb. Spotlessly clean, very well stocked and welcoming. Gave a “ar home” feeling. The GPS might be deceiving as it’s around 1 hour to Zion National Park(Visitor Center).
Great stay, thank you for hosting us!

Extra clean place with thoughtful amenities and details (e.g., outdoor stair lights, light switches and night stands next to the bed, outlet extender, and plastic bags and wrap for snacks on the road).
The place is thoughtfully laid out and designed.
Very quiet and nice space to rest, refuel, bath, and clean laundry.
Tyra was very helpful. Space was clean and private. Well maintained. Good place for a base to visit Zion. Only issue was we arrived in the dark and it was a little difficult to find the house.

It's a beautiful apartment with everything you'll need! The kitchen ist well equiped and everything is thoughtfully decorated. We felt at home immediately. It's the perfect location for exploring Bryce Canyon and Zion National Park. We would definitely recommend!!

Very quiet, clean, large suite with Lord of the Rings motif. Loved having a washer & dryer in unit to use since we were on a long road trip. While we didn’t meet Tyra in person, she was quick to respond to texts and even had the unit ready early & let us know we could come earlier than regular check in time!
Great location. Beautiful decor inside. Upscale. Very clean. Perfect

We had a wonderful time at Tyra’s place. Their space was a cozy, well-equipped room with hints of Lord of the Rings scattered throughout. We were able to explore Bryce and Zion National Parks with ease from here. Tyra and Chris were very friendly and respectful to our privacy. Definitely worth the visit if you’re exploring Utah’s parks or just driving through!

Tyra's place was perfectly cozy and a great place to stop for a quick rest on a long trip! She was super accommodating for an extra guest (originally a solo trip, but had a last minute addition, did NOT exceed maximum number of guests for the listing) and very responsive to my messages.
Instructions to find the place were very detailed with photos included!
Lovely stay!
Quick, easy stay in Cedar City. Would certainly rent out again.

The perfect place to land for a peaceful night's rest. Super clean (we appreciate the no pets policy due to allergies), bright and cozy. Kitchen and bathroom were well stocked and bed was comfy. Having a washer and dryer to use was wonderful! They truly thought of everything. Tyra was very proactive in communicating everything we needed know. We would love to stay here again!
Very lovely place! Cute, clean, and very comfortable bed after a long day hiking.

Had a very relaxing stay!
Super comfortable bed! And cuddly blanket!
Wonderfully unique place with lots of attention to detail!!! we loved the "second breakfast club" mugs and all the decor! We would definitely stay again!
We talked to Chris about recommendations and Tyra’s list of favorites was promptly sent to us. The place was so cozy we would have loved to live there! Everything about our stay was lovely.
Such a well functioning, well equipped home. Studio apartment was perfect for the 2 of us. Hosts were attentive and very friendly but didn't interfere with our stay.
Whether or not you are a Lord of the rings fan or not this is a great place to stay! It was clean, open, and comfortable. The details in decor were fun! The hosts were responsive and friendly.
Our stay was comfortable and exactly what we needed for our stay while visiting the area national parks. We would stay again. Additionally, Tyra went the extra mile to accommodate.
Very clean and comfortable. We were just passing through overnight and this was a great spot to rest before going on to Zion.
Great host with a clean place and clear instructions for checking in and out.
